summary.overview: This JCL performs an IMS database unload operation for card demo authentication data. It first deletes any existing unload dataset, then extracts the complete DBPAUTP0 database contents to a sequential file for backup, recovery, or data migration purposes.
business_functions: Delete existing card authentication database unload file to ensure clean processing
Extract card authorization data from IMS database DBPAUTP0
Convert hierarchical database records to sequential file format
Create portable backup copy of card authentication information
Generate unloaded dataset for data migration or processing by other applications

DBPAUTP0.jcl.program_overview: IBM system utility for file management operations - deletes existing datasets
IMS Database Recovery Control utility - performs database unload operations

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Authorization Database Unload File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.IMSDATA.DBPAUTP0)
datasource_summary.business_name: Card Demo Authorization Database Unload File
datasource_summary.function: Output file used to store unloaded IMS database data with variable blocked records for Card Demo authorization processing

datasource_summary.name: IMS System Load Library (OEMA.IMS.IMSP.SDFSRESL)
datasource_summary.function: IMS system load library containing executable modules and utilities required for database unload operations

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Application Load Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Application-specific load library containing Card Demo application modules needed for unload operations

datasource_summary.name: IMS Program Specification Block Library (OEM.IMS.IMSP.PSBLIB)
datasource_summary.function: IMS library containing program definitions and database access specifications for application programs

datasource_summary.name: IMS Database Description Library (OEM.IMS.IMSP.DBDLIB)
datasource_summary.function: IMS library containing database structure definitions and metadata for database operations

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Authorization Database (OEM.IMS.IMSP.PAUTHDB)
datasource_summary.function: IMS database containing authorization and authentication data for Card Demo application

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Authorization Database Index (OEM.IMS.IMSP.PAUTHDBX)
datasource_summary.function: IMS database index or extension file related to the authorization database for enhanced data access

datasource_summary.name: IMS Procedure Library (OEMPP.IMS.V15R01MB.PROCLIB)
datasource_summary.function: IMS procedure library containing database processing parameters and configuration settings

datasource_summary.name: Primary IMS Recovery Control Dataset (OEM.IMS.IMSP.RECON1)
datasource_summary.function: Primary IMS recovery control dataset containing database recovery and logging information

datasource_summary.name: Secondary IMS Recovery Control Dataset (OEM.IMS.IMSP.RECON2)
datasource_summary.function: Secondary IMS recovery control dataset providing backup recovery information

datasource_summary.name: Tertiary IMS Recovery Control Dataset (OEM.IMS.IMSP.RECON3)
datasource_summary.function: Tertiary IMS recovery control dataset for additional recovery control backup

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IEFBR14["IBM system utility for file management operations - deletes existing datasets (IEFBR14) "]
    DFSRRC00["IMS Database Recovery Control utility - performs database unload operations (DFSRRC00) "]
